posts.title: So you want to be a hero?
posts.title_plain: So you want to be a hero?
posts.content: Play the game and save your species from the invasion! Become a marine, handle your big weapon and dress that impressive exoskeleton to save the human race like a boss. Or if you prefer, be a monstrous beast and save those cute grangers from those two-legged invaders who only know how to turn beautiful organic equilibrium into lifeless machines and dead concreted worlds.
